website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive table with a decidedly modern vibe. If you want something that's a little different, this table won't disappoint.
pros: Small enough to fit in a nook
Blends with both retro and modern decor

website_summaries.verdict: A modern dining table for smaller families. Great for apartments or as a secondary table in a breakfast nook.
pros: Comfortable chairs are well-padded and support a good deal of weight
Tabletop is secured down to the legs
cons: Smaller profile won't hold larger families or groups

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for a wonderful dining table
customer_reviews.text: Great value. The table is spacious, versatile, and stylish. Definitely meets all my needs and looks great in my studio apartment. The only problem I had was setting it up. The other reviews did not lie - instructions were very confusing! You’ll need at least 2 hours for setup. Other than that, would definitely recommend this dining table.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute; looks collegic so if you’re over 30 you should get something nicer
customer_reviews.author: joan sims

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but not pure white.
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! The only thing you should know is that it is not true white. We purchased the white chairs to match and they are not the same color. It’s not that noticeable so we decided to keep it. Other than the color and the confusing assembly instructions this table is great for any small dining room. My photo shows the difference in color from the chairs to the table. The table color is more of an off white.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Good table for the money
customer_reviews.text: Cute table for the money! Just be careful when choosing a chair since the rods don't allow you to push the chair under and you sometimes hit your knees.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrieleighm

customer_reviews.title: This table is the perfect size, it looks great
customer_reviews.text: This little table is just what I was looking for. I have a small office and needed a sitting area for working with clients. This table is the perfect size, it looks great, and feels really sturdy. I couldn’t be happier with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Leighbells

customer_reviews.title: A nice little table
customer_reviews.text: It took me a bit to figure out how to get it assembled; but once i did it looked great. Arrived very timely and packaged well. Very satisfied, exactly what I was wanting.
customer_reviews.author: jeanette cain

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions are simple but assembly itself is very hard. If you’re doing alone, you’re gonna have a hard time screwing and tightening while holding both the legs and crosspieces. Also, the provided screws aren’t long enough to screw on the washer when putting the cross pieces and legs together Update: some of the screws definitely weren’t long enough. I had to go to the hardware store to get 45 mm screws in order to finish putting this together. Took hours to do it and was harder to build than my bedframe, which I assembled alone
customer_reviews.author: Poontblank35

customer_reviews.title: The instructions are plain wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Step one is wrong. The short end of the black leg holder goes against the table, not the long end. When you fix this, assembly goes smooth. If you follow the instructions, the table will break as the tensile strength of the metal cross sections will pull out the screw holes.
customer_reviews.author: Santos

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this table at all
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this table at all. It is very, very hard to assemble. Is it too expensive for the quality. Also when one sits down hits the knees in the iron bar underneath. It’s just looks but functionality not at all. I could not assemble it properly not even with help.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Way better than people made it seem
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of recent reviews about how terrible the instructions were but they weren't bad at all. I honestly think those people just don't have much assembly experience because I had the table together in all of 15 minutes. Just make sure not to tighten any of the hardware up until it is all together and it all fits great (just as the manual suggests). I don't think the company should get bad reviews based on user error. Spend the money and buy an assembled version if you are not handy or at least don't blame the company when they are giving us a deal with the cost of additional assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bag

customer_reviews.title: Love this little table
customer_reviews.text: Love this little table. Perfect for a family of two. Tricky to put together and be careful with the black pieces if bent to stretch to hard they will break.
customer_reviews.author: Caress

customer_reviews.title: Come sit!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table, however , it’s difficult to assemble. It’s a nice size, but I wish my chairs would slide under. Overall it’s beautiful a great deal fo the price.
customer_reviews.author: Songpeddlar

customer_reviews.title: Looks fabulous! A little tricky to put together for one person
customer_reviews.text: Really cute table and matches my kitchenette area perfectly. It’s very sturdy ones it’s put together. I would say it’s perfect for two people, 4 would be a little crammed I think. I used industrial style metal chairs and added a little succulent in the middle. Looks great! The only compliant I have is that it was tricky for me to put it together on my own. It would be best to have an extra set of hands to help build. The black metal stability beams can get tricky but eventually got it. I would still recommend this product and don’t regret buying it! Looks fabulous and way more expensive than it was! Love!
customer_reviews.author: LKS1989

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Love how it looks. Goes well in my apartment and the matching chairs I got. Was really easy to assemble over all looks like it will last a while. I was really pleased with the material doesn’t look cheap at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is not as hard as the reviews make it to be!
customer_reviews.text: Take this product for what it is: a stylish compact table. This table is not large, tall, or very hardy, but is perfect for my little space right next to the kitchen. A lot of the reviews had dissuaded me from making this purchase because they stated it was impossible to assemble. If you follow the directions closely, I found that it was actually pretty simple to assemble. Keep in mind that if you don’t follow the directions and tighten the nuts completely as you go instead of leaving them loose till the end of assembly, this assembly will be impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Chirasmita Kompella

customer_reviews.title: Love My Table!
customer_reviews.text: The table rose above my expectations. The table took a little while to put together but I did it without help. The table is very sturdy. I have had many compliments on the table. I was afraid that our puppy would scratch the white surface jumping up but no scratches! Thank you for the follow up Vogue Carpenter. I appreciate your email and thank you for providing your customer with a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size little table for my eat in kitchen area
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size little table for my eat in kitchen area! This table is quite sturdy and looks good paired with my mid century modern Eames style chairs! Assembly was not easy, it took awhile! There were some scratches on the legs of the table upon arrival, see pictures attached with my review. I chose to keep it anyway, the scratches were not serious and I highly doubt anyone that visits will notice because they are so close to the ground. Overall the table is of good quality!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I would give this table no stars if I could. First of all it’s virtually impossible to put this piece together as you have to hold the crossbars up into different places while screwing it in. I had help from someone and we were attempting to put this piece together for three hours and the bars just don’t reach, I guess they aren’t the right size. I then asked multiple neighbors to help and this problem still occurred to the point where it’s just not worth it so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina D.

customer_reviews.title: Bad instructions, I expected chairs too like the picture.
customer_reviews.text: I have assembled parts of jet fighters before so I know how to assemble things yet this one had very bad instructions and took me about an hour to assemble. Could have been 15 min if they put a few more steps in the instruction sheets. Also I expected the table to come with the chairs as in the picture. Why put chairs in the picture if it’s not a part of the deal? Also one of the bottom screws that holds the footing of the table was going in too deep and making the table not stable. I solved it in an unusual way but sloppy quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty confusing to figure out how it fits together, but once it's set up it looks beautiful! Can be a little difficult to clean stubborn stains, but I've found that using the rough side of a sponge helps remove them. Comfortably seats four.
customer_reviews.author: Emily J.

customer_reviews.title: Great table for small spaces without looking to small.
customer_reviews.text: Used this table for my design center office. And it fit the space perfect. Seemed to be well made. Loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HEED REVIEWS BEFORE PURCHASING
customer_reviews.text: I only saw one of the bad reviews before purchasing this. There are some good photos posted of what it looks like all put together- that is if you CAN put it together :( This piece of hardware is close to impossible to assemble and I mean this from a perspective of someone who spent three hours trying every angle to make sure I hadn't done something incorrectly. Screws are not the right size, holes for legs are placed in the wrong area making it honestly impossible to assemble. It's very disappointed when you spend hard earned money on something that cannot be used and is literally a few pieces of cheap mismatched products.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Small table with no room for legs or chair.
customer_reviews.text: CONS: - Color of the table is off-white NOT bright white as shown in the pictures. - Assembly instructions are very confusing. Need at least 2 people for assembly. - Cannot even fit a normal size chair under the table, let alone your legs. Legs need to be off to the side. PROS: - Compact size. - Minimalistic design
customer_reviews.author: Cam M. Z.

customer_reviews.title: it is beige not really white
customer_reviews.text: nice. it is just beige instead of white so is contrasts with my white chairs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful BUT so difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my balcony. It is a stunning table; it is also sturdy and the perfect size. BUT it is difficult to assemble so be patient.
customer_reviews.author: Norcaris

customer_reviews.title: I love the table and it was a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love the table and it was a great price. Thankful there was a video because it gets confusing with overlapping some of the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice & Sturdy Table
customer_reviews.text: The dining table was fairly easy to put together. The packagers taped the instructions to the item so my instructions ripped and I had to figure it out on my own. It was my first time putting a table together. I like that it is sturdy and sleek. My teenagers especially enjoy it. If you have long legs, the wiring can be annoying. It’s great for a small kitchen area because it is not that big. I’m thinking of putting it on the patio. Through it all, I like the table.
customer_reviews.author: E.S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of this table and it's quite sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this table and it's quite sturdy! Pay close attention to the directions I did not and had to take it apart after wrestling with the screws. The legs tend to want to flop around when you are first putting it together so you may want to have an extra set of hands to help you out. Other than a few curse words and me feeling a tad stupid for not following the directions ( Mind you this was all my fault) I ended up with a very cool table! The little adjustable feet are awesome for making the table very solid. The style is fantastic particularly for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Margeaux

customer_reviews.title: It is a beautiful table, but not very nicely prepared for assembly
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful table, but not very nicely prepared for assembly... two of four springs got bended during installation, and one nearly got broken. It works for now, but i don't know how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Liza Bam

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little bit smaller than I thought, I just have 2 chairs with it. It is more of a bistro table than a dining table. Also, it stains very easily and hard to clean. Assembly was a little challenging since I did it alone, help would be... helpful. The decorative wire looks great but prevents you from fitting your legs under the table comfortably, could be annoying. Great price though.
customer_reviews.author: meginlasvegas

customer_reviews.title: The product I received was impossible to put together. ...
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was impossible to put together. Other reviews said it was difficult to assemble because of the design, beyond that the product I received had screws which did not fit the bolts that they were suppose to thread through so assembly was IMPOSSIBLE.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Mesiti

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, easy-ish to build!
customer_reviews.text: Looks really great! I’ve only had it up for just over a week, but it feels sturdy. It was easy-ish to build alone. Definitely doable but takes a bit of patience. Can easily fit two people, but it probably would be a bit cramped for more.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Super cute - might be hard for pure idiots to assemble lol
customer_reviews.text: Needed something kid proof but still cute. Assembly was easy for those with common sense - noticed some reviews complaining about assembly..... come on guys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Table.
customer_reviews.text: It is shorter than I expected it to be but I truely love this table. If there was a way to make this taller it would be perfect! I put it together alone but I would recommend using 2 people. Even with proved instructions being emails I found it on the harder side to put together by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Good small table
customer_reviews.text: The size of this table fit good in the small area we have. Need to pay attention to the assembly instructions and don't tighten any of the fasteners until all components are together and in place - allow for a small amount of movement. Then tighten up everything. Very sturdy for a small table
customer_reviews.author: RDH

customer_reviews.title: You wont regret it.
customer_reviews.text: It got here on time and took less than 20 minutes to set up. It is really cute and works perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE (go to ikea instead)
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER WRITE REVIEWS...... However, this was not easy to assemble. Be sure to order magnifying glasses to read the instruction manual. In addition, the video that accompanied my purchase was nothing like my experience. Im convinced the pre drilled holes were not properly placed. After multiple attempts, i gave up on the last iron bridge. As you will notice in my photo, the iron bridges are pulling so hard that they’re bending. Dont make same mistake i made and Go to ikea instead of buying this
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Polanco

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking table but not very useful
customer_reviews.text: Table looks great - mid century modern style, although little to no legroom. Assembly takes a while but relatively study and scratch resistant... but again, the leg room is almost non existent due to the cross bars underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Nice but difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I like how this table looks and it’s perfect for my small apartment and seems very sturdy. However, it was difficult to assemble. The instructions that come with it are not accurate. I recommend watching the video that they email you instead of following the paper directions. But I would first recommend trying to buy this used from someone on FB Marketplace, Offer Up, etc. so you don’t have to assemble this!
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Directions are weird to follow. I’d recommend looking at an actual pic of the built table and then looking at directions to get a better visual of what they mean. Once you get it, it doesn’t take long to put together. During your first few steps it wouldn’t hurt to have an extra pair of hands. Great size for two and works great in my little sitting area.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Porter

customer_reviews.title: Instructions a little unclear.
customer_reviews.text: It took both me and my boyfriend and the instructions to put this thing together. What I found it wasn’t clear on was you needed to put the wooden legs on as you were putting the metal pieces on because they all kinds used the same screws. Idk how to explain it. But it wasn’t clear that they needed to go together but once we figured it out everything made sense and it went together perfectly. And before you say “well that’s common sense” we were just trying to follow the instructions I feel like they could’ve been revamped a little bit because were not dumb people and it took us a moment to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany F.

customer_reviews.title: I have to say I love this set
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I love this set. Not only is it incredible for the price - it is stunning! It did, however take two days to get the assembly right. It is quite complicated but the results are well worth it. How on earth is it so inexpensive for such a quality product?!
customer_reviews.author: Easton Thomas

customer_reviews.title: "Must Have Patience to Assemble"
customer_reviews.text: I think this table, and the chairs I bought with them are super cute! However, if you don't have patience to assemble furniture, let alone by yourself, think twice about purchasing this unassembled. Installing the crisscross wires underneath the table was a little tricky. I suggest screwing the bolts in ALL by hand before using the tools included to tighten them all in. It took me a little under an hour to assemble but I was pretty content in the end. I love the clean white finish of the table with the accents of wood and black wire. My 2nd biggest draw back, however, was how short it was. But, it's super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Izzie Dee

customer_reviews.title: Awful, none of the pieces work or fit..... AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: Updating this, If I could give it zero stars I would. So even after finding the right parts, this table doesn't assemble correctly. So disappointed with the manufacturing. DO NOT BUY So I ordered this, and everything was going well until some of the leg assembly when instead of receiving 4 40mm bolts and 4 45mm bolts. I received 8 40mm bolts, will update review once I go to the hardware store to buy 45mm bolts. Kinda disappointed but it is only $89
customer_reviews.author: Jane Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little table
customer_reviews.text: 3 years ago I was looking for a small table for use as a breakfast table, a homework table for my granddaughter and everyday use. I couldn't find what I wanted so I purchased this table to use until I could. Well I've never looked for another. This table is perfect for my small kitchen, unbelievable price, very pretty, sturdy, wipes clean easily and it seems it will hold up to everyday use for years to come . I'm back to purchase another for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne G

customer_reviews.title: Required additional hardware; Table is yellowed
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could get a refund because I can't afford to ship it back. This table is not white but a yellowish color. Assembling it was a nightmare; The metal pieces are literally not long enough to be assembled. I had to shop around town for new bolts that had an extra centimeter of length just to fit the pieces together. I'm not happy with this table.
customer_reviews.author: Lemures

customer_reviews.title: Parts included can't be used to assemble the table.
customer_reviews.text: This product is complete garbage! The hardware that comes with this table cant be used to put it together. The nuts that came with the table dont even fit the fasteners! I had to go to a hardware store to get 8 nuts that actually fit! One of the fasteners (screws) was too small to fit that nuts I purchased and that was the only fastener that fit with the nuts included in the packaging. If thats not enough after I finally put the table together I discovered one of the legs was much shorter than the others. So now it is lopsided even with me adjusting the feet! This is a nightmare and I'm returning it!
customer_reviews.author: Shawana K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect petite size for my small, eat-in kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when I read many of the reviews citing that this table was impossible to put together, but I'm happy I went through with the order. The direction sheet came with photos -- like ikea furniture -- and I thought it was relatively straightforward. I assembled this alone, so it took me a bit longer than it would have if I had someone holding up the metal supports, but it went together easily, and it's a perfect size for my small, eat-in kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to be assembled
customer_reviews.text: As many customer wrote in the review, the seller sent me pieces that don't fit to be put together. The black supporting metal cross bars--2 can be assembled but other 2 can't fit in the space between legs. I asked 3 expert to help me out but the give same answer. I compared pieces I got with those in youtube videos, not same pieces. Either seller sent wrong ones by mistake or did not update their furniture. The table finally broke down when I was installing. Very disappointed. Sell please contact me. I just need a refund. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute table, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to amend my previous review of the company but didn't know how to go about it. I received this table without the feet, contacted the company and they promptly mailed the feet to me. I appreciate the quick service. The table is cute, just right for a first time studio apartment for my son. I agree with a previous review, if you are over 30, you should probably get a more substantial table. But for my son it's perfect, it's small, light and easy to move anywhere in the room. It was easy to assemble as long as you have another person holding the legs as you screw it together.
customer_reviews.author: CCW

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with the ease to put it together, don't know whey everyone else had such an issue. The legs are very study and the table is level. I definite recommend for small breakfast nook or somewhere with minimal space. The leg braces do get in the way of your legs sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Gunnar

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but not super functional
customer_reviews.text: Good looking table, easy enough assembly. But it’s not a regular table height - kind of short. I feel like I have to bend over in my chair to reach down to it when I’m eating. Also scooting in is difficult because my knees are constantly hitting the black bars that are used for support. I’m not a big girl, but I have to sit kind of sideways at this table. Good for a quick cheap fix if you’re desperate, but I wouldn’t recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Schuster

customer_reviews.title: Cute Little Table
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable table! It was way to put together and is even easier to clean. It’s the perfect size for my small 9ftx9ft apartment dining room. It doesn’t swallow up the space.
customer_reviews.author: SilviaJasmin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing & Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Little Table! I was able to install this myself in about 35-45ish minutes! I did have to stare at the instructions to make sure I had the correct angles on the bars, but the pictures are clear and I was able to figure it out. The instruction video that was sent with it also helped! Not sure why so many people had issues with it? Beautiful little table, very sturdy, and the perfect size for the TINY Chicago apartment!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: HARD TO ASSEMBLE
customer_reviews.text: The metal pieces on this table are impossible to assemble. My husband and I were drenched in sweat by the end, and we still didn't get one part together because it won't fit! The table, aesthetically, looks great. I would have returned if it wasn't for my strong-willed husband. I am giving it 4 stars because, I spoke with customer service and they issued me a full refund without having to pay a bunch to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicollette Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great modern look, exactly how it appears Cons: Hard to assemble. I wasn’t able to get the final screw in as it became too tight. Also, the material on top is not great. I inverted the top to put on the legs and when I turned it again, there were scratches all of the surface even though there was nothing on the floor. There was no disclaimer or warning that the surface scratches that easily. I have to now cover it with a table cloth to hide the scratches. Overall disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shifali

customer_reviews.title: DON'T PURCHASE THIS TABLE!
customer_reviews.text: This table was a big mistake! From opening the box to completion, nothing went right. There was no possible way to assemble given the instruction sheet. And when we did try to circumvent the problem to finally assemble, the table rocks due to table legs being uneven. This table is an everyday reminder of wasting my money!
customer_reviews.author: K.G. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Top Melts Very Easily
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while to review this table, and as much as i love it, there are some major issues. First, the instructions are very difficult to follow, but realistically it’s possible to put it together by yourself. My issue lies with the top of the table. Put anything too hot or anything with chemicals on the surface and it melts. I put a bottle of nail polish remover on the table, melted the top; non bleach cleaning supplies, melted the top; hot coffee cup, melted the top. Makes me wonder if the table top is even food safe.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Why did this happen?????
customer_reviews.text: Missing hardware so I cannot assemble the table. Some hardware was loose in the box. Table was purchased "used" but it should havhave been assured to have hardware needed to put it together. I don't want to return the item but I want a package with the hardware sent to me immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Carron Cruse

customer_reviews.title: I unpacked it after it had been shipped just fine and then when spending four hours to put the ...
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this table at ALL costs. I unpacked it after it had been shipped just fine and then when spending four hours to put the legs on the table they bent and scratched the table bottom beyond repair. This table is as cheap as the ladies on the street though at least they leave you happy at the end of the night. Not tossing the new kitchen table you bought in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Crossfield

customer_reviews.title: Cute Bistro Style Table
customer_reviews.text: Cute little Bistro style table and super easy to put together. The pictures in the instruction aren't all that clear but I just laid everything out and "hot bolted" all the pieces to make sure they were correctly put together and once I saw that they looked like the picture...i went through with my ratchet and tools provided in the kit and tightened everything up. Works great for my small space.
customer_reviews.author: MRS. THIBODEAUX

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table for eat in kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love love my table. Setup was somewhat easy. My mom put it together for me. It fix perfectly in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Catrice Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Nice but nothing extraordinary. VERY DIFFICULT TO ASSEMBLE
customer_reviews.text: The table is nice. But I can’t look at it just thinking how we suffered for three hours trying to put it together. The instructions are useless and incomplete. The screws are too short. 2 or 3 mm longer would do the trick. If I would have known the difficultly I would have bought a different table. I’m not sure it’s worth the effort. It did come on time!
customer_reviews.author: Friendly

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this little table
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this little table. Finally got it out together for a little breakfast table near my coffee bar. It was not the easiest to put together alone but still doable in about an hour. I had such a large open area and I’m very happy with not only the size, but price and quality of this piece. Would recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: LoriLV

customer_reviews.title: Good for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a very good table. The only two things that bug me about it are that one of the legs is noticeable a different color than the rest and one of the little rubber pieces on the bottom of the leg keeps falling out every time I move the table. But you get what you pay for and like I said, for the price, it's pretty good quality. Perfect for small kitchens.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking, Sturdy Table
customer_reviews.text: Overall the table is of good quality and perfectly fits my chairs I also bought on Amazon. It has a nice modern aesthetic and is a great size for 2-4 chairs and to provide a non-intrusive but attractive table to a small space. It was not the easiest table to put together, but I assume most everyone could figure it out eventually. Only complaint is that one of the table legs did have some sort of dirt or mold on them that left very slight stains on them after cleaning them off. Nothing too bothersome or noticeable though.
customer_reviews.author: Megan D.

customer_reviews.title: Good table, but returned it back
customer_reviews.text: Table is good. Hight quality, rich colors, not so hard to assemble like other people say, but if you do not have enough experience in it, have someone to help you. I have done it on my own pretty fast. But I returned it. Rested on the table with my knees, wasn't comfortable to use it. If you are around 5,8" tall, think twice) also good service from seller, they were very helpful and tried to do the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small area and sits 4 people perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had the table for about a year now and I really love it. This table is perfect for a small kitchen/area. It’s held up nicely, a few minor scratches and dents (I have children). Easy clean up, my children have spilled juices, and paint on it, but all the spots came off easy. The only issue I have with this table, is that the black metal bars that hold the legs up, make it hard to find chairs that are able to be pushed in under the table. Also, difficult to put together alone. Other than that, I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Short table but very minimalist
customer_reviews.text: I love the table, it's a bit short from what I imagined it would be, my computer desk is taller than these dining table and it can look a bit awkward since one table is next to the other. Also it was a bit hard to understand the instruction on the black leg pattern assembly, I had to search for a tutorial to explain these step, but a one person can assemble it, with a bit of patience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the easiest assembly
customer_reviews.text: This table was a bit of a puzzle to assemble especially since the instructions were not super clear, and it’s possible to build it alone although you will have to do a bit of yoga to hold opposing table legs straight while screwing in the crossed sections, but the final look is very minimalist and elegant in my opinion. I took 1 star off my review because my table top had a small dent on it, it’s not a deal breaker to me though.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula

customer_reviews.title: If putting it together is as difficult to repack for a return I’m in trouble
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed- each leg has an insert in the bottom to allow one to screw in the leg rests and it was hollow! Only 3 legs had the insert- So I had to return it
customer_reviews.author: laura alonso

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed- Awful Instruction Manual
customer_reviews.text: This product should never be purchased used. Parts were missing, the manual was ripped, and the table was chipped. Very disappointed in my decision to purchase this table.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce W.

customer_reviews.title: As the other reviews stated....
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are nil at best. It took ME an hour And still was no where. Called my friend and it took us over 2 hours to assemble (and I’m petty handy)! If you don’t get frustrated abs give up its a really nice little table.
customer_reviews.author: stefanie limpo

customer_reviews.title: no instructions whatsoever 💩
customer_reviews.text: beautiful table, small but convenient, can easily sit 4 people. instructions are useless when you try to assemble the metal connectors. couldn’t find a video on that subject either. after 45mins (and a couple 🍻) figured out my own way to assemble it. definitely need at least 2 persons to hold things in place. sad part it came with a horrible dent on one border 😞, but i’m too lazy to return it 🙄
customer_reviews.author: rebecca merced

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This table is so pretty. Arrived very fast , the assembly was easy. I recommend for anyone seeks affordable modern look. It is a bit smaller than what expect but in general great!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Once built this seems to be a great table for a small area
customer_reviews.text: Once built this seems to be a great table for a small area. We are using it as a table in our kitchen, 2 adults and 2 kids fit fine, tight but fine. I will say building it took alot more time and i ended up watching a video because the directions are terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Teass

customer_reviews.title: The table assembled well and is sturdy; however
customer_reviews.text: The table assembled well and is sturdy; however, the table top scratches very easily. There are also pen marks that will not come off. I have tried everything! I tried to return after the first month, but I missed the period to return. I would avoid if you will be doing any time of work on this table. I wish I had bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Need four legs
customer_reviews.text: I love my table it is small and modern contemporary , which is what I wanted for my dining room table. My only gripe is that I wish the table had four legs instead of 3 the legs get in the way if you decided to want to tuck your chairs in. Other than that I have no issues.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to put together, even with two people
customer_reviews.text: The item is fine ONCE YOU PUT IT TOGETHER. I don’t know how two people are supposed to effectively put this together, let alone one person. The nuts don’t fit and I had to use a pair of pliers to tighten them. The legs have these weird pieces that require at least one other person to hold and it’s just super inelegant.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy Franklin

customer_reviews.title: I suggest buy a glass table topper to preserve the table.
customer_reviews.text: The modern look is awesome - although the table top is not really white - more of "off-white" which does not match my white chairs. Also the top scratched easily and has chalky feel after I try to clean up the scratch. you get what you pay for... I suggest buy a glass table topper to preserve the table.
customer_reviews.author: Jo L

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of usage I can safely say that this table has met any and all our expectations. Sure we bump into it from time to time when we scoot in but, it's not anything worth docking points for. The Eiffel wireframe design makes it so you can't directly tuck chairs underneath but you know what you're signing up for given the design so again, knee bumps and all, there is no need to dock points, the table is well built and perfectly suits our needs. You'd be hard pressed to find anything like this for this price point anywhere else. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Rivera

customer_reviews.title: This is a great table for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table for the price. I put it together myself and it was fairly easy to build. It is sturdy, looks great, and doesn't look cheap. I have two Herman Miller chairs and I was worried that the table would look silly or cheap next to the chairs but it really doesn't at all. I have two chairs at the table and although the picture shows four, I think it would be a little crowded.
customer_reviews.author: miami22

customer_reviews.title: Literally impossible to set up
customer_reviews.text: Spent about an hour trying to set-up, what is seemingly, an easy set of directions. However, after an hour I gave up because the metal crosses just don't fit. Waited until the following day to see if my friend (who is also an engineer) could help. I figured I was just doing something incorrectly. Unfortunately, neither of us could figure it out. Wish I had read the review prior to purchase as it seems many others have had the same issues as me.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great Style for a Good Price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this table for a small studio apartment and it has turned out perfect for the space! Assembly was pretty easy, but having your own tools would help make the overall structure sturdier I think. I covered the top with marble contact paper, but the overall style of this table compliments my small space while giving enough space to fit a few people for dinner! Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: bailey

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE to put together.
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLY made. So extremely difficult to put together. I just Re did my entire kitchen on my own and I’m sitting on the ground about to scream with this stupid table. Don’t waste your time and money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Miller

customer_reviews.title: TABLE BROKE AFTER 1 MONTH
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this table and when it came we needed a replacement table because the parts were incorrect. After we received the replacement and tried putting the table together the parts would not match up so we only installed two of the four black wire pieces. Because of this the table was wobbly and broke. Do not purchase
customer_reviews.author: LZ

customer_reviews.title: Cute table!!
customer_reviews.text: Great little table! Using as my desk in my classroom. I needed my teenage son to help me assemble. It’s simple to put together, but I needed another set of hands assembling the crossing bars underneath. All tools are included. Directions are easy to read. Table is sturdy. Getting lots of compliments about it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to assemble by yourself
customer_reviews.text: Was a total disaster trying to assemble. The X brackets hardly fit together when trying to put the legs on. I ended up having to go to the hardware store to by longer bolts just to try to get it all to fit together. Then once I finally had it all assembled, one leg ended being an entire inch shorter than the rest, making the table wobbly. Junk. Would not recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Fair price, cute table, good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The table was as described and fits its purpose in my son room. One of the hardware pieces to attach the foot was missing, but the seller promptly and courteously sent me a replacement leg. Due to the cross bars underneath it is difficult to push the chairs all the way in and will be a tight fit for 4 chairs. The tabletop is not super durable and is already starting to show wear from the use by my children. Overall I am happy with the purchase for the price I paid. Good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: DBL TRBL

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, doesn't include chairs
customer_reviews.text: I love this table because it's so sturdy. The only downside is that you tend to bump your knees on the diaganol support bars. Otherwise, it's a lovely table. I wish it were more clear that chairs are not included, but it's still a good deal and a nice little table for a breakfast nook, dorm room, or other small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to put together, even after an exchange for a new one
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered two now, and neither can be put together. The holes are either too close together, the support brackets are too big or the leg holes are too high. I've put together my own couch and loveseat from Ikea, I've constructed bookshelves from scratch and kits, I am not dumb, illiterate or inexperienced. These are just being manufactured or packaged incorrectly.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great improvement to what existed in our space previously
customer_reviews.text: Great improvement to what existed in our space previously! Looks snazzy, lots of complements. truly there is enough room for 4 to eat with elbow room, will fit 4x: 10" plates, silverwear and cups. I wish it were about 5inches wider but the price is beautiful and I think it will last us 25 year olds a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: the instructions are not super clear, but I was still able to put ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading the mixed reviews, I still went ahead and purchased the table. Yes, the instructions are not super clear, but I was still able to put it together by myself. It's sturdy, and looks nice for the price. I have four chairs around the table and haven't sat at it with four people yet, but believe we will be cozy, but comfortable. I am using it primarily as a dining table, but also will be doing work at it occasionally. I think it's size is great for both, especially if you live in a tight space.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Modern on a budget
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this table - along with 4 white chairs - to go in my kitchen. The “white” tabletop is definitely off-white or creamy, especially when paired with the chairs. It’s good quality for the price though! And if you’ve put together ikea furniture before, the instructions will be no problem!
customer_reviews.author: K. Dilley

customer_reviews.title: Great Breakfast nook table!
customer_reviews.text: Had an open space area that was hard to decide on what type of table to get. I already have a 6 seat dinning table, to needed something not that big. I browsed around and found this table. It's style is perfect for my decor. Took 35min to assemble. Keep all the hardware semi-lose when assembling and it will turn out great! Added matching plastic chairs too.
customer_reviews.author: Rudyo78427

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It’s just what you would expect in this price range, a good value – the only reason it did not get five stars is that it is a bit short, not a lot, just about an inch shorter than most standard dining tables. However, this work well for the kids! The only other Dang is that the directions are not perfect - but, if you are patient and laid it all out, it goes together pretty well and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble, great when it’s done!
customer_reviews.text: This was a PAIN to put together. Directions aren’t detailed but I finally figured it out. Knocking down one star due to this. FYI I assembled this alone. I am fairy new putting together my own furniture... another note - if the screws are too short chances are you have the legs on backwards. Small holes the leg face inward for those on this step. The directons didn’t make that clear. Once I figured that out- it was smooth sailing. Otherwise , happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 💚

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Pieces!!
customer_reviews.text: Either the table holes are misplaced or the metal bars are the wrong size. As you can see in the picture, there is absolutely no way that the pieces fit together. when one of the legs are placed in the bracket, the one immediately adjacent to it can go in at the expense of pushing out the rest of the legs out of placement. Something is clearly wrong and all the comments about it being hard to assemble are justified. I'd like the correct pieces mailed to me.
customer_reviews.author: ekim1210

customer_reviews.title: Directions are wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER write reviews. I felt compelled to save someone else the trouble. This is easily the worse thing I have ever bought and kept. The table is fine, but the directions are a nightmare. YOU MUST PUT THE SHORT side of the metal bracket against the table, not the long side as stated in the directions. I have never been so annoyed assembling something in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Drock23

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid little table with caveats...
customer_reviews.text: Solid little table, but the assembly instructions are a little weird. If I didn’t have a photo of the thing the instructions would have been useless. Fortunately it’s not the space station. However, the leg supports are knee bangers! I was hoping to be able to sit at the table but my knees kinda prevent that. It’s more of a side table, or casual café table than a table you can eat comfortably at. Maybe with MUCH shorter than average chairs...
customer_reviews.author: Christopher G

product_meta.title: Coavas Kitchen Dining Table White Round Coffee Table Modern Leisure Wooden Tea Table Office Conference Pedestal Desk
feature_bullets: Kitchen dining table-- improved paint layer: we improved the thickness of the paint layer to make it more resistant to daily use scratches. 16mm Healthy and anti-corrosion table Top, Easy to clean.
Kitchen dining table-heat resisting property: 5 layers Piano baking Varnish technology table Top, it won’t change its Shape even at a 200ºc temperature.
Kitchen dining table-- MODERN and Sturdy Beech table legs with clear and tidy texture combined with a Eiffel designed inspired in the modernist mid century.

Kitchen dining table--: Smart Leg design： 4 pieces wear-resisting foot pad to prevent floor scratching and damper noise. Embedded hidden screws that beautify and prevent you legs from bumps while sitting.
Kitchen dining table-- multifunctional: intended for multiple uses: as a Coffee table, workstation, for leisure, and in your terrace or garden.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars1,038 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
